APv.caption: Contract Chain
APv.doc: Chain that the contract is deployed on. Choices: Ethereum, Rinkeby, Polygon, Mumbai.
APv.name: contract_chain

APx.caption: Color Scheme
APx.doc: The accent color for the checkout (buttons and links). Valid values: gray, red, orange, yellow, green, teal, blue, cyan, purple, pink
APx.name: color_scheme

APy.caption: Seller Twitter Handle
APy.doc: Override the seller's Twitter handle for this checkout.
APy.name: seller_twitter_handle

APz.caption: Collection Image URL
APz.doc: An image preview on the checkout. Supports .gif, .jpeg, and .png up to 10MB. Make sure it starts with https://
APz.name: image_url

AQA.caption: Collection Name
AQA.doc: The name of the NFT collection.
AQA.name: collection_name

AQB.caption: Collection Description
AQB.doc: Optional: A description of the NFT collection.
AQB.name: collection_description

AQC.caption: NFT Contract Address
AQC.doc: The smart contract address of the NFTs being sold.  Example: 0x51bc2de5181a1964ad65669cf25ba0e97b8a84bf
AQC.name: contract_address

AQE.caption: Cancel URL
AQE.doc: The URL that buyers will be redirected if they are unable to complete this purchase, such as using an expired one-time purchase links
AQE.name: cancel_url

AQF.caption: Success URL
AQF.doc: The URL that buyers will be directed after a successful checkout.
AQF.name: success_url

AQG.caption: Limit Per Transaction
AQG.doc: Set the max quantity allowed per purchase. Note: A buyer is still able to make multiple purchases. Defaults to 5.
AQG.name: limit_per_transaction

AQW.caption: Marketplace Listing ID
AQW.doc: The marketplace listing ID that was returned when this NFT or pack was listed on this Marketplace.
AQW.name: marketplace_listing

AQX.caption: Pack Address
AQX.doc: Only use if you are creating the checkout for a "NFT pack" listed on a "Marketplace". Specify the pack address if you would like the pack to be opened before being transferred to the user.
AQX.name: pack_address

AQZ.caption: Pack ID
AQZ.doc: Only use if you are creating the checkout for a "NFT pack" listed on a "Marketplace". Specify pack Id if you would like the pack to be opened before being transferred to the user.
AQZ.name: pack_id

AQk.caption: API Key Required, Please visit Paper.xyz to sign up and receive an API key.
AQk.name: info
